QuestData.Title: Shields Down!
QuestData.Description: De time has come, commanda. Packleader Kargora an' de Arkonite Shield no longa protected.$B$BWe need ta kill her an' destroy de shield crystal.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Keep her from using Telaar as an impenetrable base for the Warsong clan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Packleader Kargora and destroy the Arkonite Shield.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm sorry to hear about Kajassa's shadow hunters, but we couldn't afford to let the Warsong have Telaar.$B$BWith the death of Kargora and her pack, we're one step closer to the invasion of the Warsong's home, Grommashar.$B$BOne step close to justice.
